hero.title: AR Traders
hero.subtitle: Premium Dry Fruits & Nuts
hero.description: With over 25 years of experience, we import the finest varieties of dates, Turkish figs, premium chocolates, and nuts from around the world. Quality and freshness guaranteed.

products.title: Our Product Categories
products.description: Each category features carefully selected, premium quality products sourced from the finest growers worldwide.

nuts.title: Premium Nuts
nuts.description: Premium almonds, cashews, pistachios, and roasted peanuts

dryFruits.title: Dry Fruits
dryFruits.description: Turkish figs and premium naturally dried fruits

chocolates.title: Imported Chocolates
chocolates.description: Premium imported chocolates from Europe and worldwide

dates.title: Premium Dates
dates.description: Medjool, Ajwa, and specialty dates from Jordan, Saudi, Iran & Algeria

about.title: Why Choose Our Premium Selection?
about.description: With over 25 years of experience in the dry fruits and nuts industry, AR Traders has built lasting relationships with growers worldwide who share our commitment to quality and sustainability. Every product is carefully selected, tested, and packed to deliver the finest experience to our customers.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We source only the finest quality dry fruits and nuts from trusted growers worldwide.

fresh.title: Natural & Fresh
fresh.description: All our products are natural, preservative-free, and packed fresh to maintain optimal taste.

premium.title: Premium Selection
premium.description: Carefully curated selection of premium varieties to ensure exceptional quality in every bite.

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Quick and reliable delivery to ensure you receive your order fresh and on time.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have questions about our products or need custom orders? We'd love to hear from you!

footer.description: With 25+ years of experience, your trusted source for premium dates, Turkish figs, imported chocolates, and finest nuts. Quality and freshness guaranteed with every order.
footer.copyright: AR Traders. All rights reserved. | Quality guaranteed since 1999.
